description:
A name synonymous with hardcore bondage, extreme torment, and screaming orgasm, is Iona Grace. Her and I have a bit of history, so I know exactly what makes this slut purr, as well as how close to the edge I can take her. She is tough and beautiful, and is a true pain slut with a hunger for suffering.

She wanted to be pushed, physically and mentally, and you bet that she was closer to the edge than she has ever been before. These positions were all designed with her in mind, knowing that she could handle them and suffer just the way we all want to see.
title: Closest to the Edge
